summary.span: 组织将应用于其他控件的样式。

span.span: Organizes styles that will be applied to other controls.

summary.span: 若要了解如何开发 ASP.NET 移动应用，请参阅 ASP.NET 移动应用和网站。

span.span: For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see Mobile Apps & Sites with ASP.NET.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 一个控件可以包含任意数量的样式对象，或者更专业的样式对象的继承类。A control can contain any number of style objects, or more specialized style objects that inherit from the class. 这些应具有唯一的名称属性。These should have unique name properties. 然后可以通过在同一页上的其他控件到其属性。You can then refer to other controls on the same page by their property. 此类有没有可视化表示形式。This class has no visual representation. 页还可以使用外部样式表，并且多个页面可共享相同的外部样式表。A page can also use an external style sheet, and several pages can share the same external style sheet. 有关样式的详细信息，请参阅[\<样式 >](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/0048ce21-2c92-4377-a211-9aca9efdf748)元素和主题。For more information about styles, refer to the [\

permission.span: 用于在宿主环境中进行操作。

span.span: for operating in a hosted environment.
Demand value: ; Permission value: .

The specified background color for the style.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 与其他属性，不同属性不继承自其父级。Unlike the other properties, the property is not inherited from its parent. 例如，如果您设置为上一个父控件，子控件的属性将不会继承蓝绿色的背景色。For example, if you set the property to cyan on a parent control, a child control will not inherit the background color of cyan. 您必须显式设置子控件的属性到蓝绿色，也必须设置属性的父控件并将样式表应用于子控件。You must explicitly set the child control's property to cyan, or you must set the property of the parent control and apply the style sheet to the child control. 这是与级联样式表的行为保持一致。This is consistent with the behavior of cascading style sheets.

exception.span: 已在运行时访问了 属性。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法不是处于只读模式可用接口。This method is not available in the read-only interface. 可以使用应用此方法的所有类的方法。You can use the method for all the classes where this method applies. 例如，方法集合中清除所有的样式在集合; 或者对于，它会清除集合中的所有选项。For example, the method for a collection clears all the styles in the collection; or for the , it clears all the choices in the collection. 将字段添加到该控件的对象列表更改数据绑定行为的字段，并要求你再次将数据绑定到控件。Adding a field to the fields of an object list changes the data-binding behavior of the control, and requires you to bind data to the control again.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在页上的样式表继承中引用的用户控件的根级别定义的样式表样式。The style sheet on the page inherits the styles in a style sheet defined at the root level of the referenced user control. 例如，如果用户控件的样式表有一个名为`Style1`，则页可以访问`Style1`，就好像在页上的样式表中一样。For example, if the style sheet on the user control has a property named `Style1`, the page can access `Style1` as if it were in the style sheet on the page.

span.span: Introduction to the StyleSheet Control
